title: Nordstrom Rack To Open New Location In San Diego County
description: The 24,000-square-foot store will be located at El Camino Promenade.
content:
Nordstrom Rack, the off-price retail division of Nordstrom, is slated to open its doors in spring 2026 in Encinitas. The retailer offers "great brands at great prices" and up to 70% off apparel, accessories, beauty products, home decor and shoes, according to the company.

 "We look forward to being a part of the Encinitas community and serving our customers with an amazing offering of great brands at great prices," said Gemma Lionello, president of Nordstrom Rack. "We're excited to grow our footprint in the San Diego market and introduce new customers to the Nordstrom experience."

The 24,000-square-foot store will be located at El Camino Promenade, an Encinitas shopping center that includes Bevo, Dollar Tree, Five Below and TJ Maxx. El Camino Promenade, is owned and operated by an affiliate of Kimco Realty and is located off of El Camino Real and Via Molena. "We're thrilled to welcome Nordstrom Rack to El Camino Promenade and the vibrant Encinitas community," said Genevieve Anderson, property manager of Kimco Realty. "As one of the most recognized names in fashion retail, Nordstrom Rack is a perfect complement to our diverse tenant mix and reflects our continued commitment to bringing quality, convenience and style to North County shoppers."



The company currently operates 68 Nordstrom Rack stores and 26 Nordstrom stores in California. There are currently five Nordstrom Rack locations in San Diego, as well as stores in La Jolla, National City, Oceanside and San Marcos. Last fall, Nordstrom Rack opened its newest San Diego area store in the Clairemont Town Square shopping center.
summary: Nordstrom Rack, the off-price retail division of Nordstrom, is set to open its doors in spring 2026 in Encinitas. The 24,000-square-foot store will be located at El Camino Promenade, an Encinational shopping center. The retailer offers discounts on apparel, accessories, beauty products, home decor, and shoes. The company currently operates 68 Nordstrom Rack stores and 26 Nordstrom stores in California.
shortSummary: Nordstrom Rack will open its first store in San Diego in 2026, offering up to 70% discounts, in line with previous successes.

Business & Tech
Nordstrom Rack Opens New Store In San Diego
The store opened its doors in the Clairemont Town Square shopping center.
SAN DIEGO, CA — Nordstrom Rack has a new location in San Diego.
The store opened its doors Thursday in the Clairemont Town Square shopping center.
Nordstrom Rack, the off-price retail division of Nordstrom, offers "great brands at great prices" and up to 70% off apparel, accessories and shoes for the whole family, according to the company.
Find out what's happening in San Diegofor free with the latest updates from Patch.
The 26,000 square-foot store gets new deliveries every week, with 90% of the same brands available at Nordstrom, including Adidas, Calvin Klein and Nike, among others, according to Nordstrom. The store also features beauty products and home goods.
"Clairemont Town Square is a community favorite for shopping, dining and socializing. The exciting addition of Nordstrom Rack to our already diverse collection of retailers will offer visitors an even more vibrant and complete experience," said Taylor Pham, vice president of Merlone Geier Partners, which owns and manages the shopping center.
Find out what's happening in San Diegofor free with the latest updates from Patch.
With the addition of the new location and 10 other announced store openings, Nordstrom will operate 68 Nordstrom Rack stores, 22 Nordstrom stores, five Nordstrom Locals and one ASOS | Nordstrom in California, according to the company.
There are now five Nordstrom Rack locations in San Diego, as well as stores in La Jolla, Oceanside, National City and San Marcos.
The Clairemont Town Square store opened at 9 a.m. with a grand opening celebration.
The location is open from 10 a.m. to 9 p.m. Monday through Saturday, and from 11 a.m. to 7 p.m. Sunday. The store is located at 4829 Clairemont Drive in San Diego.

argos_summary: Nordstrom Rack is set to open a new store in Encinitas in spring 2026, offering discounts of up to 70% on various products including apparel and home decor. The 24,000-square-foot store will be located at El Camino Promenade, enhancing the shopping experience in the area. This addition will expand Nordstrom Rack's presence in the San Diego market, where it currently operates five locations.
